title: Twists and Turns
description: With fear, horror, death and despair, these stories will surprise you, scare you and occasionally make you smile. Twists & Turns offer the reader thought provoking tales. Whether you have a minute to spare or an hour or more, open Twists & Turns for a world full of mystery, murder, revenge and intrigue. A unique collaboration from the authors Elly Grant and Zach AbramsA selection of stories by Elly Grant and Zach Abrams ranging in length across flash fiction (under 250 words), short (under 1,000 words) medium (under 5,000 words) and long (approx. 16,000 words)
author: Zach Abrams
